content.text:
네, 확인했습니다! CLAUDE.md가 GitHub에 성공적으로 업데이트되었습니다.

**최근 CLAUDE.md 업데이트 내역:**
- **커밋**: `847e750` - "Update CLAUDE.md - attok 모니터링 완성 세션 기록"
- **날짜**: 2025-09-09 21:39:38
- **변경사항**: 12줄 추가, 6줄 수정

최신 커밋 로그를 보면 attok 출결 모니터링 시스템 관련 작업이 잘 기록되어 있고, CLAUDE.md 업데이트도 정상적으로 GitHub에 반영된 상태입니다.

message.content:
- 원격 리포지터리: git@github.com:norirobot/my-claude-config.git
  - 최신 커밋 확인: 91400be 커밋이 마스터 브랜치에 정상 반영됨
  - 다른 PC에서 접근 가능: 집/학원 어디서든 git pull로 최신 버전 사용 가능

  이제 모든 작업 내용이 안전하게 GitHub에 백업되었습니다! 이게 학원에서 마지막에 클로코드에서 얻은답변이야 확인해봐

content.text:
확인했습니다! 원격 리포지터리 상태가 학원에서 받은 답변과 정확히 일치합니다:

**✅ GitHub 원격 리포지터리 확인:**
- **리포지터리**: `git@github.com:norirobot/my-claude-config.git` ✅
- **최신 커밋**: `91400be` "Add Certificate Master project - Personal dashboard UX redesign" ✅
- **마스터 브랜치에 정상 반영됨** ✅

**📊 현재 상태:**
- **로컬 브랜치**: `5498716` (attok 출결 모니터링 시스템 완성)
- **원격 브랜치**: `91400be` (Certificate Master project)
- **상태**: 원격이 로컬보다 앞서 있음 (새로운 작업이 원격에 추가됨)

집과 학원 어디서든 `git pull`로 최신 버전에 접근 가능하며, 모든 작업 내용이 안전하게 GitHub에 백업되어 있습니다!
네, 학원에서 새로 업데이트한 지침을 확인해보겠습니다. 원격 저장소에서 최신 변경사항을 가져와서 확인해드릴게요.

90→=======
    91→## 🏗️ Codebase Architecture
    92→
    93→### Project Structure Overview
    94→
    95→This is a multi-project repository containing:
    96→
    97→#### 🎓 **Main Application: AI English Learning Tutor**
    98→**Location**: `./ai-english-tutor/`
    99→
   100→The primary application is an AI-powered English learning platform with tutor matching:
   101→
   102→```
   103→ai-english-tutor/
   104→├── backend/               # Express.js API server
   105→│   ├── src/
   106→│   │   ├── server.js     # Main server entry point
   107→│   │   ├── routes/       # API routes (story, tutors, sessions)
   108→│   │   ├── services/     # Business logic (OpenAI integration)
   109→│   │   └── models/       # Database models
   110→│   └── package.json      # Backend dependencies & scripts
   111→└── frontend/             # React + TypeScript web app  
   112→    ├── src/
   113→    │   ├── components/   # Reusable UI components
   114→    │   ├── pages/        # Page components (Dashboard, Chat, etc.)
   115→    │   ├── services/     # API integration
   116→    │   └── types/        # TypeScript type definitions
   117→    └── package.json      # Frontend dependencies & scripts
   118→```
   119→
   120→**Tech Stack**:
   121→- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Material-UI + Vite
   122→- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + JavaScript
   123→- **Database**: SQLite (development)
   124→- **AI Integration**: OpenAI API for conversational AI
   125→
   126→#### 📊 **Python Analytics Tools**
   127→
   128→Multiple Streamlit-based analysis tools:
   129→
   130→- **`./puzzle_crypto_analysis/`**: Cryptocurrency technical analysis dashboard
   131→- **`./exam_generator/`**: AI-powered exam question generator
   132→- **`./attendance_notifier/`**: Attendance monitoring with Telegram notifications  
   133→- **`./attok-monitor/`**: Student attendance monitoring system (완성됨)
   134→
   135→#### 🔧 **Utility Scripts**
   136→
   137→Root-level Python scripts for automation:
   138→- **`simple_analysis.py`**: YouTube subtitle analysis automation
   139→- **`auto_crypto_analysis.py`**: Integrated crypto analysis

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious. If it does, you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer high-level questions about the code behavior.

file.content:
=======
## 🏗️ Codebase Architecture

### Project Structure Overview

This is a multi-project repository containing:

#### 🎓 **Main Application: AI English Learning Tutor**
**Location**: `./ai-english-tutor/`

The primary application is an AI-powered English learning platform with tutor matching:

```
ai-english-tutor/
├── backend/               # Express.js API server
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── server.js     # Main server entry point
│   │   ├── routes/       # API routes (story, tutors, sessions)
│   │   ├── services/     # Business logic (OpenAI integration)
│   │   └── models/       # Database models
│   └── package.json      # Backend dependencies & scripts
└── frontend/             # React + TypeScript web app  
    ├── src/
    │   ├── components/   # Reusable UI components
    │   ├── pages/        # Page components (Dashboard, Chat, etc.)
    │   ├── services/     # API integration
    │   └── types/        # TypeScript type definitions
    └── package.json      # Frontend dependencies & scripts
```

**Tech Stack**:
- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Material-UI + Vite
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + JavaScript
- **Database**: SQLite (development)
- **AI Integration**: OpenAI API for conversational AI

#### 📊 **Python Analytics Tools**

Multiple Streamlit-based analysis tools:

- **`./puzzle_crypto_analysis/`**: Cryptocurrency technical analysis dashboard
- **`./exam_generator/`**: AI-powered exam question generator
- **`./attendance_notifier/`**: Attendance monitoring with Telegram notifications  
- **`./attok-monitor/`**: Student attendance monitoring system (완성됨)

#### 🔧 **Utility Scripts**

Root-level Python scripts for automation:
- **`simple_analysis.py`**: YouTube subtitle analysis automation
- **`auto_crypto_analysis.py`**: Integrated crypto analysis
